title: She's One In A Million
itunes:title: She's One In A Million
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m married to a man that spoils me and says he loves me unconditionally. We have been married for only 3 years but we’ve been together for 7 years. I’ve never suspected him of cheating until recently. We like to have lunch and dinner on the patio at our favorite restaurant so we can people watch. He is not the type to get mad if I comment on a man that passes by.....................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
